com.oreilly.servlet
Class MultipartWrapper

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
        |
        +--javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
              |
              +--com.oreilly.servlet.MultipartWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.ServletRequest
public class MultipartWrapper
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper

A request wrapper to support MultipartFilter. The filter capability requires Servlet API 2.3.

See Jason Hunter's June 2001 article in JavaWorld for a full explanation of the class usage.

Version:
1.0, 2001/06/19
Author:
Jason Hunter, Copyright © 2001
